card.name: Aegis Angel
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

card.name: Because I Have Willed It
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, if they cast four or more spells this turn, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Aerial Responder
card.property: Flying, vigilance, lifelink

card.name: Behold My Grandeur
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, add {U}{B}{R} to your mana pool. When you set this scheme in motion, if you control six or more lands, you may search your library for a card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Anointer of Champions
card.property: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Bow to My Command
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) As you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent. Creatures the chosen player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may tap any number of untapped creatures they control with total power 8 or greater. If they do, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.property: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

card.name: Choose Your Demise
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put the cards in that pile into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Excoriate
card.property: Exile target tapped creature.

card.name: Delight in the Hunt
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token and prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pain is a delusion of the weak. I'll demonstrate."

card.name: Expedition Raptor
card.property: Flying When Expedition Raptor enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

card.name: Every Dream a Nightmare
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent discards a card. You draw a card for each land card discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let me unburden you of these fatuous hopes."

card.name: Fencing Ace
card.property: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

card.name: For Each of You, a Gift
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My generosity blesses you all, even the undeserving."

card.name: Fiendslayer Paladin
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Fiendslayer Paladin can't be the target of black or red spells your opponents control.

card.name: Know Evil
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, up to one target opponent can't attack with creatures, up to one target opponent can't cast creature spells, and up to one target opponent can't cast noncreature spells. You can't target any player more than once.

card.name: Flickerwisp
card.property: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Make Yourself Useful
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To think you've spent years honing your body only to die like this."

card.name: Gideon Jura
card.property: +2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able. −2: Destroy target tapped creature. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

card.name: The Mighty Will Fall
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. That player loses 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cry out for your comrades so that they may join you in misery."

card.name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: My Forces Are Innumerable
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) At the beginning of your end step, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token. At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may sacrifice two creatures. If they do, abandon this scheme.

card.name: Grand Abolisher
card.property: During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of artifacts, creatures, or enchantments.

card.name: My Laughter Echoes
card.property: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Whenever you set a non-ongoing scheme in motion, you may abandon this scheme. If you do, set that scheme in motion again.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Groveling already? I'm just starting to enjoy myself."

card.name: Grasp of the Hieromancer
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls."

card.name: No One Will Hear Your Cries
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent chooses a creature he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your companions were lucky to have died first."

card.name: Lightwielder Paladin
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever Lightwielder Paladin deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target black or red permanent that player controls.

card.name: Pay Tribute to Me
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control six or more lands, each opponent sacrifices another creature.

card.name: Mentor of the Meek
card.property: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Power Without Equal
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, draw three cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn. If you control six or more lands, you may cast up to three nonland cards from your hand without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Moment of Heroism
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: A Reckoning Approaches
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gates open to my new era."

card.name: Odric, Master Tactician
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever Odric, Master Tactician and at least three other creatures attack, you choose which creatures block this combat and how those creatures block.

card.name: There Is No Refuge
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals 3 damage to up to one target creature. Create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.

card.name: Precinct Captain
card.property: First strike Whenever Precinct Captain deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: This World Belongs to Me
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Little insects, I have created entire worlds and extinguished twice as many."

card.name: Relief Captain
card.property: When Relief Captain enters the battlefield, support 3. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three other target creatures.)

card.name: What's Yours Is Now Mine
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls and untap it.

card.name: Shoulder to Shoulder
card.property: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) Draw a card.

card.name: When Will You Learn?
card.property: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent exiles the top card of his or her library. You may cast any number of nonland cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't fret, infants. It wouldn't have worked anyway."

card.name: Sun Titan
card.property: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Youthful Knight
card.property: First strike

card.name: Compulsive Research
card.property: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless he or she discards a land card.

card.name: Icefall Regent
card.property: Flying When Icefall Regent enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Icefall Regent. Spells your opponents cast that target Icefall Regent cost {2} more to cast.

card.name: Ior Ruin Expedition
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Ior Ruin Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Ior Ruin Expedition and sacrifice it: Draw two cards.

card.name: Prognostic Sphinx
card.property: Flying Discard a card: Prognostic Sphinx gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it. Whenever Prognostic Sphinx attacks, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Reckless Scholar
card.property: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

card.name: Sphinx of Jwar Isle
card.property: Flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) You may look at the top card of your library. (You may do this at any time.)

card.name: Vision Skeins
card.property: Each player draws two cards.

card.name: Windrider Eel
card.property: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Windrider Eel gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Archfiend of Depravity
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures he or she controls, then sacrifices the rest.

card.name: Deathbringer Regent
card.property: Flying When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

card.name: Doom Blade
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

card.name: Harvester of Souls
card.property: Deathtouch Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Nightscape Familiar
card.property: Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.

card.name: Overseer of the Damned
card.property: Flying When Overseer of the Damned enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature. Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Reckless Spite
card.property: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
card.property: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

card.name: Avatar of Fury
card.property: If an opponent controls seven or more lands, Avatar of Fury costs {6} less to cast. Flying {R}: Avatar of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Blood Ogre
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

card.name: Chandra, Pyromaster
card.property: +1: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. That creature can't block this turn. 0: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. −7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
card.property: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Chandra's Phoenix
card.property: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Coordinated Assault
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Dualcaster Mage
card.property: Flash When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Fiery Fall
card.property: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.property: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)

card.name: Grim Lavamancer
card.property: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Guttersnipe
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Hammerhand
card.property: Enchant creature When Hammerhand enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. (It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under your control.)

card.name: Inferno Titan
card.property: {R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.property: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Obsidian Fireheart
Searing Spear
card.property: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Skarrgan Firebird

card.name: Stormblood Berserker
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Sudden Demise
card.property: Choose a color. Sudden Demise deals X damage to each creature of the chosen color.

card.name: Torchling
card.property: {R}: Untap Torchling. {R}: Target creature blocks Torchling this turn if able. {R}: Change the target of target spell that targets only Torchling. {1}: Torchling gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: Torchling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Volcanic Geyser
card.property: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Cultivate
card.property: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Explore
card.property: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Fertilid
card.property: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches his or her library for a basic land card and puts it onto the battlefield tapped. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Forgotten Ancient
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

card.name: Hunter's Prowess
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

card.name: Khalni Heart Expedition
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Nissa, Worldwaker
card.property: +1: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land. +1: Untap up to four target Forests. −7: Search your library for any number of basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Those lands become 4/4 Elemental creatures with trample. They're still lands.

card.name: Oran-Rief Hydra
card.property: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Oran-Rief Hydra. If that land is a Forest, put two +1/+1 counters on Oran-Rief Hydra instead.

card.name: Press the Advantage
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Rampaging Baloths
card.property: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the land is angry, so are they." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Retreat to Kazandu
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • You gain 2 life.

card.name: Scute Mob
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.

card.name: Sylvan Bounty
card.property: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Thragtusk
card.property: When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life. When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature block Turntimber Basilisk this turn if able.

card.name: Vastwood Zendikon
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 6/4 green Elemental creature. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Vines of the Recluse
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Woodborn Behemoth
card.property: As long as you control eight or more lands, Woodborn Behemoth gets +4/+4 and has trample. (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)

card.name: Baleful Strix
card.property: Flying, deathtouch When Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Blood Tyrant
card.property: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, each player loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Tyrant for each 1 life lost this way. Whenever a player loses the game, put five +1/+1 counters on Blood Tyrant.
